name: Tank it! (itch)
description:
TANK IT!  is an arcade top down shooter where must try to survive for as long as possible.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by Alberto "_beta" Mellado and Pablo "Chotalive" Martínez.

-----------------------

Written in ActionScript.

This was the first or second game I made, its really simple and it even doesn't has a restart button, but hey,  it was our first year inside gamedev. 

Both the music and the art were done by the talented Chotalive.

-----------------------

Controls:

Player:

Movement -> WASD

Shoot -> Click 

------------------------

Contact:

-----------------------

I think this is a neat prototype and maybe later I could make a v2.
